dimensions.label: Risk Taker
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will boldly and confidently take risks, often leaping before looking.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options and approach challenges with a more measured pace.

dimensions.label: Humor
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle stress or difficult situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use humor to deflect or lighten the mood, often with a wry sense of humor.
Your FarTwin will inject fun and playfulness into tense situations, using laughter to break the ice.

dimensions.label: Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically analyze data and break down complex problems into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their decision-making, often trusting gut feelings.

dimensions.label: Social Skills
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be warm, engaging, and sociable, effortlessly connecting with people from diverse backgrounds.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller social circles and may need time alone to recharge, valuing personal space.

dimensions.label: Financial Values
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach money and material possessions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving, investing, and living below their means, avoiding unnecessary expenses.
Your FarTwin will enjoy indulging in luxuries and treats, valuing experiences over material possessions.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set realistic goals, prioritize tasks, and focus on making progress toward deadlines.
Your FarTwin will strive for precision, often overestimating the time needed to complete tasks and risking missed deadlines.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues and cultural differences?

options.description: Your FarTwin will consider diverse viewpoints, empathize with others, and seek common ground in their interactions.
Your FarTwin may cling to established norms and values, potentially overlooking or downplaying cultural differences.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive to outdo and excel in team efforts, often prioritizing personal achievements over collective success.
Your FarTwin will prioritize the well-being of others, actively listening and offering guidance when needed.
